DNA laboratory

Dnipro, UA

A DNA laboratory in the city of Dnipro. The designed DNA laboratory building holds significant value for Ukrainian society. Its primary task is the identification of individuals based on their DNA remains, with the purpose of transferring the deceased to their relatives. This issue has become highly relevant during wartime.


The company Architect Expert is deeply grateful for the opportunity to design such an important building. The building is two-storied, with a complex shape in plan, fitting within a rectangle measuring 47.14x26.14 meters, with a basement, a combined roof, and a rooftop gas boiler room. Structurally, the DNA analysis laboratory building belongs to the monolithic frame type.

The main technical specifications include:

Plot area within the design boundaries

2550 m²

Built-up area

2114.5 m²

Total area of premises

2041.73 m²

Usable area of premises

1846.48 m²

Calculated area

1393.73 m²

Paved area

2631.4 m²

Landscaped area

971.1 m²
